title: Sporting goods industry : Revenue of Easton Bell Sports 2013
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue (in million U.S. dollars), with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2008.
gold: This graph depicts the revenue of the sporting goods company Easton-Bell Sports from 2006 to 2013 . In 2006 , Easton-Bell Sports generated revenues of 639 million U.S. dollars . Easton-Bell Sports makes sports equipment and clothing under the brands Bell Sports , Blackburn , Easton , Giro , and Riddell .
